author: Colin Bowles
title: Marshall Takes Down Golden Eagles
text:
Marshall Takes Down Golden Eagles Posted: HUNTINGTON (WVVA) - 
Marshall moves to 5-1 overall as they took down Southern Mississippi 31-10, Friday night. 
Chase Litton went 11-21 while trowing for 163 yards and two touchdowns. Devon Johnson rushed the ball 22 times for a score and 82 yards. 
The Herd pick up their second win in the C-USA and stay atop of the East. They will get a full weeks rest before traveling to Florida Atlantic for another C-USA matchup.
